Class FortificationUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.risk.ui.FortificationUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class FortificationUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    The Class FortificationUI is an Observer observing the elements of FortificationPhaseModel Class.
    Author:
    Navjot Kaur Bhamrah
